attributes.action: Ask that nigel Farage be put forward  for a  knighthood
attributes.background: Nigel Farage for 20yrs has worked with pride for the people of great  Britain has a euro mp.he has been instrumental in the referendum to exit the eu..no other person deserves this award. Than nigel Farage.

rejection.details:
Please refer to this website for information about how the honours system works:
